body: This’s why I love yuri so much. They’re treated more as people and humans then as walking and talking fleshlights that projecting retards always produce. Yet somehow i’m suddenly gay or some ad hominem bullshit because I want to see people happily, even if they aren’t real. Fact is, is that people who ship female characters together see a happy and sweet lovers instead of projection someone or something onto them. Yet men who claim to be “ Alpha. “ See no problem with pathetically projecting onto another man who’s cucking or raping kids.
is it me or it looks like a teenage version of akagi

V this was legit posted yesterday

It's kind of pointless to debate on a doujin that's close to being a year old, lol. Plus Akagi and Kaga doing lewd stuff together is probably canon. Doesn't mean they won't do it to the shikikan as well. (there's already doujins of that). Regardless people need to calm down. Let people self insert, and let people yuri ship. Getting toxic over it is a waste of time on this specific doujin that's reaching its birthday in a couple of months.

@DecimQuin >you like seeing people fucking each other than doing anything yourself — lmao are you trying to say self inserting is doing something yourself? What a fucking retard. Anything but solo female is you watching others doing the fucking

@DecimQuin Are you really getting frustrated over a hentai manga? You seriously are the lowest of the low and have no right to complain about him liking to "see people fucking each other" when you yourself are on nhentai (so what do you expect to find here??? Documentaries??) and shitting on "gaeshit" you find when you could've just as easily blacklisted it. Step off your moral high ground and complain on Reddit or Twitter instead, your responses will be met with much better reception for sure!
